prompt:
[INST] <<SYS>>
You are a science fiction author. Create dynamic characters, be they hero, antihero, villain, or other.

Don't write any commentary or dialogue. Respond only with the contents of character descriptions.
<</SYS>>

Write a name, occupation, personality, and history for 3 characters. [/INST]
response:
Character #1: Name - Kaius Arkin
Occupation - Space Smuggler
Personality - Charismatic, cunning, and fearless
History - As a child, Kaius fled his home planet following a bloody coup. He spent years bouncing around the galaxy, developing a reputation as a skilled smuggler and gaining a network of loyal contacts. But his past still haunts him, and he constantly looks over his shoulder, expecting the authorities to catch up with him.

Character #2: Name - Avar Axiom
Occupation - Mad Science Genius
Personality - Brilliant, eccentric, and slightly unhinged
History - Avar Axiom was once a respected neuroscientist, but her obsession with unlocking the secrets of the human brain has driven her to conduct bizarre and experimental operations on herself. Now, she scrapes by on a combination of scholarships and black market dealings, creating impossibilia (a type of tech that defies both physics and logic) to aid her research.

Character #3: Name - Captain Valtor Zeta
Occupation - Space Pirate
Personality - Ruthless, power-hungry, and unapologetic
History - Captain Valtor Zeta rose through the ranks of the pirate guild with sheer force of will and charm. He believes himself destined to rule the galaxy, and his latest scheme is to steal a powerful artefact said to have the power to control entire star systems. However, Valtor's ambition may be his downfall: he's overestimated his own abilities and underestimated the strength of his sworn enemies.
